title: Kicked out of promos
body:
I have been duo ranking with a friend since season start. Our lp difference was only 2. We both hit promos together at the same time, lost the first game, then won the next two. At the end of this, he was promoted and I was given a message saying "grats on hitting promos".... when I checked my history on op.gg and league match history, I found that league put me down in lp even though I was in my promos. It said I was one loss, two to go, with 84lp.... which is impossible. I should be in silver 3 atm, any help Riot?
Thank you, 
Miftlanly

replies.body: After looking up your match history, it looks like there was a match in your promos where you dodged (intended or not). Most summoner's don't realize, but queue dodging in your promos will result in a loss. Be sure to check out all the finer details of the [**ranked queue**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h2q2).

Good day,

I was recently in my promos, i played my first game and i lost. i was already granted a free win, but my 2nd game was lost. After checking my profile i saw i was kciked out of promos while i still had 1 game left? can you fix this im at 84 lp now for no reason i dont understand this.
Summonername : Grimmoncuin

Edit: I DIDNT DODGE! i did not dodge at any cercumstances. I did quit the game for 1min cause of lagg issues and joined back in right away, please fix this im having trouble with this elo i really want to get out.

Many Thanks.
